messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Emil. May I know your name, please?
Hi Emil, my name is Tara.
Nice to meet you, Tara! How can I assist you today?
I have a question about my account and the KitKat products I recently purchased.
Of course, Tara. I would be happy to help you with that. What specifically would you like to know regarding your account and KitKat products?
I noticed a charge on my account for KitKat items that I didn’t order. Can you help me understand this charge?

I’m sorry to hear about the unexpected charge, Tara. Let me pull up your account details and take a look for you. Can you please provide me with your account number or email address associated with the account?
Thank you, Tara. I’ve found your account. It looks like there was a recent order for a variety pack of KitKat that was placed. Did you perhaps authorize someone else to use your account?
Oh, yes! I completely forgot that my sister used my account to buy some KitKat. Thank you for clarifying that, Emil.
No problem at all, Tara. I’m glad we could clear that up. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s all I needed. Thanks for your help, Emil!
You’re welcome, Tara! Have a great day and enjoy your KitKats!
